title: Person of Interest: John Reese vs Stills
author: Joseph Bennet
comment: This and the opening scene is what made me fall in love with this show, so gutted it’s over
"I went all around the world looking for bad guys when there were plenty of you here all along."
Beware of the ones with nothing to lose. Like a cornered wildcat, they are at their most lethal as you can't take anything from them that's already gone.
You can't go wrong when you use a Massive Attack song for your tv/film scene.
And that's how kids John Reese became a detective 😂
